item.title: Blog Bilingual Publishing Made Easy — GitHub Actions + Gemini API in Practice
item.author: xianpeng.shen@gmail.com (Xianpeng Shen)
item.description: Discovered my blog has more English than Chinese readers? So I used GitHub Actions + Gemini API to automatically translate articles into English, saving time and effort.
